00023 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
00024 class TFileSerializerComp: public CFileSerializerCompBase
00025 {
00026 public:       
00027        typedef CFileSerializerCompBase BaseClass;
00028 
00029        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(TFileSerializerComp);
00030               I_ASSIGN(m_autoCreateDirectoryAttrPtr, "AutoCreatePath", "Create directory/file path automatically if not exists", true, false);
00031        I_END_COMPONENT;
00032 
00033        // reimplemented (iser::IFileLoader)
00034        virtual int LoadFromFile(istd::IChangeable& data, const QString& filePath = QString()) const;
00035        virtual int SaveToFile(const istd::IChangeable& data, const QString& filePath = QString()) const;
00036 
00037 protected:
00038        class ReadArchiveEx: public ReadArchive
00039        {
00040        public:
00041               typedef ReadArchive BaseClass;
00042 
00043               ReadArchiveEx(const QString& filePath, const TFileSerializerComp* loggerPtr)
00044               :      ReadArchive(filePath),
00045                      m_loggerPtr(loggerPtr)
00046               {
00047               }
00048 
00049        protected:
00050               // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
00051               virtual bool IsLogConsumed(
00052                                    const istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory* /*categoryPtr*/,
00053                                    const int* flagsPtr = NULL) const
00054               {
00055                      static const istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory slaveCategory = istd::IInformationProvider::IC_INFO;
00056 
00057                      return (m_loggerPtr != NULL) && m_loggerPtr->IsLogConsumed(&slaveCategory, flagsPtr);
00058               }
00059               virtual bool SendLogMessage(istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory category, int id, const QString& message, const QString& messageSource, int flags = 0) const
00060               {
00061                      if (m_loggerPtr != NULL){
00062                             QString correctedMessage = message;
00063                             QString correctedMessageSource = messageSource;
00064 
00065                             BaseClass::DecorateMessage(category, id, flags, correctedMessage, correctedMessageSource);
00066 
00067                             return m_loggerPtr->SendLogMessage(istd::IInformationProvider::IC_INFO, id, correctedMessage, correctedMessageSource, flags);
00068                      }
00069 
00070                      return false;
00071               }
00072 
00073        private:
00074               const TFileSerializerComp* m_loggerPtr;
00075        };
00076 
00077        class WriteArchiveEx: public WriteArchive
00078        {
00079        public:
00080               typedef WriteArchive BaseClass;
00081 
00082               WriteArchiveEx(const QString& filePath, const iser::IVersionInfo* infoPtr, const TFileSerializerComp* loggerPtr)
00083               :      WriteArchive(filePath, infoPtr),
00084                      m_loggerPtr(loggerPtr)
00085               {
00086               }
00087 
00088        protected:
00089               // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
00090               virtual bool IsLogConsumed(
00091                                    const istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory* /*categoryPtr*/,
00092                                    const int* flagsPtr = NULL) const
00093               {
00094                      static const istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory slaveCategory = istd::IInformationProvider::IC_INFO;
00095 
00096                      return (m_loggerPtr != NULL) && m_loggerPtr->IsLogConsumed(&slaveCategory, flagsPtr);
00097               }
00098               virtual bool SendLogMessage(istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory category, int id, const QString& message, const QString& messageSource, int flags = 0) const
00099               {
00100                      if (m_loggerPtr != NULL){
00101                             QString correctedMessage = message;
00102                             QString correctedMessageSource = messageSource;
00103 
00104                             BaseClass::DecorateMessage(category, id, flags, correctedMessage, correctedMessageSource);
00105 
00106                             return m_loggerPtr->SendLogMessage(category, id, correctedMessage, correctedMessageSource, flags);
00107                      }
00108 
00109                      return false;
00110               }
00111 
00112        private:
00113               const TFileSerializerComp* m_loggerPtr;

00128 // reimplemented (iser::IFileLoader)
00129 
00130 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
00131 int TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::LoadFromFile(istd::IChangeable& data, const QString& filePath) const
00132 {
00133        if (IsOperationSupported(&data, &filePath, QF_LOAD | QF_FILE, false)){
00134               ReadArchiveEx archive(filePath, this);
00135 
00136               I_ASSERT(!archive.IsStoring());
00137 
00138               iser::ISerializable* serializablePtr = CompCastPtr<iser::ISerializable>(&data);
00139               I_ASSERT(serializablePtr != NULL);
00140 
00141               istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(NULL, istd::IChangeable::CF_MODEL);
00142 
00143               if (serializablePtr->Serialize(archive)){
00144                      changePtr.SetPtr(&data);
00145 
00146                      return StateOk;
00147               }
00148               else{
00149                      OnReadError(archive, data, filePath);
00150               }
00151        }
00152 
00153        return StateFailed;
00154 }
00155 
00156 
00157 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
00158 int TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::SaveToFile(const istd::IChangeable& data, const QString& filePath) const
00159 {
00160        if (*m_autoCreateDirectoryAttrPtr){
00161               if (!istd::CSystem::EnsurePathExists(filePath)){
00162                      SendErrorMessage(MI_CANNOT_SAVE, QObject::tr("Cannot create path to file"));
00163               }
00164        }
00165 
00166        if (IsOperationSupported(&data, &filePath, QF_SAVE | QF_FILE, false)){
00167               WriteArchiveEx archive(filePath, GetVersionInfo(), this);
00168               I_ASSERT(archive.IsStoring());
00169 
00170               const iser::ISerializable* serializablePtr = CompCastPtr<iser::ISerializable>(&data);
00171               I_ASSERT(serializablePtr != NULL);
00172 
00173               if (!CheckMinimalVersion(*serializablePtr, archive.GetVersionInfo())){
00174                      SendWarningMessage(MI_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION, QObject::tr("Archive version is not supported, possible lost of data"));
00175               }
00176 
00177               if ((const_cast<iser::ISerializable*>(serializablePtr))->Serialize(archive)){
00178                      return StateOk;
00179               }
00180               else{
00181                      SendInfoMessage(MI_CANNOT_SAVE, QObject::tr("Cannot serialize object to file"));
00182               }
00183        }
00184 
00185        return StateFailed;
00186 }
00187

00189 // protected methods
00190 
00191 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
00192 void TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::OnReadError(const ReadArchive& /*archive*/, const istd::IChangeable& /*data*/, const QString& filePath) const
00193 {
00194        SendWarningMessage(MI_CANNOT_LOAD, QString(QObject::tr("Cannot load object from file ")) + filePath);
00195 }
